question:
[Peter] and his sister [Brandi] have been best friends ever since childhood. [Martha] loves cooking for her son. His name is [Mark] [Violet] had a great plan to surprise her husband, [Michael]. His mother, [Martha], helped with the details. [Brandi] went shopping at the mall with her father [Spencer]. [Brandi] and her brother [Peter] went to see a movie. [Brandi] planned a trip to the zoo for her brother, [Mark]. They had a great time.
Question: How is [Spencer] related to [Violet]?
